thread.title: Mom of 2 boys
thread.title_full: Mabel's Labels reviewed by Mom of 2 boys

author: Mom of 2 boys
title: Mom of 2 boys
text: I love the skinny mini labels! I use them on everything...my kids clothing, shoes, books, bags, pencils, lunch containers! I've Never have a problem with them peeling off (unless my little guy decides to take it upon himself to remove them). Been using them for seven years! Love love love them.
